title: Pittsburgh Telephone Answering Service is Relocating to a Larger Facility in Parkway Center
text:
PITTSBURGH, Feb. 28, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As of February 22, 2018, Pittsburgh Telephone Answering Service (PTAS) will be located at 11 Parkway Center, Suite 100, Pittsburgh, PA 15220. The company is moving from its Mansfield Avenue location.
The 24/7 live answering service has been expanding and its new location accommodates its growing business. In a message to existing customers, Operations Manager, Casey Meredith, stated “Your loyal support has helped us grow, and now we need more space to serve you better. We have been looking for a new home for the past few months and are happy to inform you we found it.” The 11 Parkway Center location will provide all of the same services but will accommodate more live telephone receptionists.
George Otte, President and CEO stated "We are convinced that this new venue will support our growth and represents a major company development from offering answering services to small businesses to call center solutions to enterprise-level businesses."
This new venue offers much more comfortable work spaces and offices, and a modern multi-media conference room fully equipped for training and special events. Pittsburgh Telephone Answering Service continues to answer all inquiries via (412) 919-1500 and ptas@pittsburghanswering.com .
About Pittsburgh Telephone Answering Service
Pittsburgh Telephone Answering Service (PTAS) is a 24/7 call center that provides live operator, inbound, and outbound services for businesses in a wide array of industries. Pittsburgh Telephone Answering Service is an Otte Polo company. For more information, visit http://www.pittsburghanswering.com .
